thread.title: Hippo or Dolphin?! Watching This Rescued Baby Splashing in a Pool Will Make Your Day (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Hippo or Dolphin?! Watching This Rescued Baby Splashing in a Pool Will Make Your Day (VIDEO)

author: Natasha Brooks
title: Hippo or Dolphin?! Watching This Rescued Baby Splashing in a Pool Will Make Your Day (VIDEO)
text:
Natasha Brooks February 27, 2017 
We recently brought you the story of the adorable rescued baby hippo named Humpty. The David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust (DSWT) has been working tirelessly to rehabilitate this precious girl and help her grow into a healthy happy adult hippo . 
One of Humpty’s favorite activities at the sanctuary is swimming in her personal pool , all day long until the sun sets. Watching her splashing and soaring through the air, begs the question – is she part porpoise ?! Her round, chubby body has not stopped Humpty from becoming the cutest baby hippo aquatic acrobat to ever exist. Not to mention, she is rather graceful for a hippo! 
Rescue stories like Humpty’s bring a ray of light to the sad stories of the horrific poaching that occurs daily around the world. To fight this battle against poaching, there needs to be an increase in public awareness and added support for the organizations who are working to protect the world’s many wild animals. Help spread the word about sanctuaries like DSWT and check out their website for updates on Humpty and the rest of the gang! Want to read more posts like this?
